trans-unit.source: For a complete cc|graphical extension (GX) installation, the following steps must be performed:

seg-source.mrk: For a complete cc|graphical extension (GX) installation, the following steps must be performed:

trans-unit.source: Install the external components on the server or your client PC (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="GX DLL Installation.htm#_Ref287948619" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"GX DLL Installation" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Install the external components on the server or your client PC (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="GX DLL Installation.htm#_Ref287948619" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"GX DLL Installation" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Register the Client add-in in your Microsoft Dynamics NAV database (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Register Client Add Ins.htm#_Ref350158701" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Register Client Add-Ins" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Register the Client add-in in your Microsoft Dynamics NAV database (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Register Client Add Ins.htm#_Ref350158701" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"Register Client Add-Ins" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Create or import settings (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="GX Setup Import Export.htm#_Ref287948948" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"GX Setup Import/Export" on page 1</MadCap:xref>) if the demo database is not used.

seg-source.mrk: Create or import settings (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="GX Setup Import Export.htm#_Ref287948948" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"GX Setup Import/Export" on page 1</MadCap:xref>) if the demo database is not used.

trans-unit.source: Import a GX license file (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="License Setup.htm#_Ref287949420" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"License Setup" on page 1</MadCap:xref>) if the demo database is not used.

seg-source.mrk: Import a GX license file (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="License Setup.htm#_Ref287949420" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"License Setup" on page 1</MadCap:xref>) if the demo database is not used.

trans-unit.source: Information about removing the GX installation is also included in this section.

seg-source.mrk: Information about removing the GX installation is also included in this section.
